text: Hello! The new CTA tool does not seem to use our theme settings for styling forms. I can't seem to pinpoint the class for the button in my form so that I can add the styling to my css. <https://www.clubmarketing.com/private-club-marketing-resources|This is the page> and the form button is in a pop-up when you click "subscribe â†’" - can someone tell me what class to use for styling that button? I tried "hs-form__actions__submit" but that did not work.

Hi <@U025L73EMA6>!

Unfortunately, that's how CTA tool works now. All the created CTAs are inside of an iFrame and is not possible to reach the CSS style to them at this moment.

There is a way to create custom CTAs with your own CSS & HTML tho, but I don't know if that helps you:
CTAs -> Create new -> Embeds and Buttons -> Advanced -> Embedded HTML
